idea-plugin.name: Helmet
idea-plugin.description:
How it works?

NOTE: This plugin requires that you have your KUBECONFIG file configured correctly to connect to your Kubernetes cluster, and your can access the Helm secrets for your Helm releases. This plugin provides actions related to Helm e.g. Tools > Helm > Get... and Tools > Helm > Diff... It loads the Helm Secrets from all namespaces and prompts the user for selection. It decodes the Secret to extract Chart Info, Values, Templates, Manifests, Hooks and Notes from the selected Helm Release and Revision.
  • Get... - shows chart info, values, templates, manifests, hooks and notes (as selected) information for the selected Helm Release Revision.
  • Get Selected Templates... - shows selected templates information for the selected Helm Release Revision.
  • Diff... - diffs chart info, values, templates, manifests, hooks and notes (as selected) between two selected Helm Release Revisions.
